video.title: The Queen of Flow
video.synopsis: Seventeen years after being wrongly imprisoned, a talented songwriter seeks justice against the men who caused her downfall and killed her family.

episodes.synopsis: Talented songwriter Yeimy plots revenge against those who put her in prison. She recalls her high school crush Charly, who's now a famous singer.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Teenage Yeimy mourns her loss. Soul and Bass raise money by putting on their first concert. To prove himself to his uncle, Charly accepts a risky job.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: After Yeimy confronts Charly about what he's done, he takes advantage of her feelings for him, and comes up with a plan so his uncle won't kill her.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When Juancho refuses to believe Yeimy is guilty, Charly tries to convince him otherwise. In prison, Yeimy receives a threat, followed by shocking news.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After visiting Yeimy in the U.S., her grandmother returns home to a nasty surprise. Years later, Charly wonders about his adopted brother's parentage.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Juancho mourns Yeimy's supposed death as she arrives in Puerto Rico and begins training for her undercover work as music producer Tamy.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Her training complete, Yeimy returns to Medellín for the first time in 17 years and finally comes face to face with Charly. Erik enters a music battle.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy reunites with an unsuspecting Juancho. Vanesa gets approached by a talent scout for modeling. Charly tries to win over a critical reporter.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy attends the next "cockfight" to find new talent. Charly performs a concert with reggaeton star Sebastián Yatra and debuts Yeimy's new song.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: The modeling agent pressures Vanesa to expand her personal boundaries. Yeimy brings a young new singer to Charly, and later tries to bug his office.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Vanesa tells her parents about her new job. Erik runs away from home after a fight with Charly. Juancho is forced to work for Excelsior Studios.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Erik looks for answers about his birth parents. Yeimy and Juancho collaborate to produce Cris's first track. Gema suspects Charly is still seeing Zulma.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy releases an incriminating video of Charly and Zulma, but in trying to ruin his career, she also ends up impacting his daughter, Vanesa.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Erik gets an anonymous offer that spurs him to secretly record an album with Yeimy and Juancho. Charly works on repairing his image and relationships.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: When the DEA goes after Manín, Charly gets caught in the crossfire. Yeimy tries to get Vanesa to open up to her, and gives Gema PR advice.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Erik finds out the name of his birth mother. Yeimy tries to get closer to Gema. Charly returns home and is determined to find the mole.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Charly tasks Axl with reviewing the security footage. Lucio follows Carrancho to a phone booth. Cata's growing suspicions about Yeimy annoy Juancho.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Erik meets the informant's go-between at the park. Ligia reaches her limit with Manín. Juancho and Yeimy fight over her relationship with Charly.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Erik learns who his informant was. Gema seeks another man's attentions. Charly pays a surprise visit to Yeimy's home. Vanesa and Silvana go to a party.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: The accident has devastating repercussions. Yeimy spots an opportunity and calls Silvana's father. Jack declares to Yeimy his feelings for her.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy makes a comment that leads Juancho to doubt her identity. Vanesa becomes distraught when she hears Silvana's father speak to the press on TV.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Gema searches Vanesa's room to see if she's lying about using drugs only once. Juancho contacts the musicians shown in photos with Yeimy on her website.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Juancho confronts Yeimy with his suspicions about who she really is. Vanesa argues with her parents after they reveal their plans for her.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Juancho argues with Yeimy about her vengefulness. Charly grows suspicious of Yeimy and Juancho and has her followed. Vanesa's family goes to therapy.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Charly pays a visit to the modeling agency. Yeimy calls reporter Zulma and asks to meet in private. Drug dealer Ruko reconnects with Vanesa.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Erik's single debuts on the radio. Yeimy finds a way to get Charly to ask his uncle for a favor that could reveal Manín's location.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: When Erik's single surpasses Cris Vega's, Charly starts to ask about Pez Koi and ends up in a fight with Juancho. Gema visits Triana and gets a shock.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Falcioni realizes he's being followed. Unable to reach Yeimy, Charly sinks into despair. Erik celebrates his hit single with his friends and family.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Falcioni signs a deal with the DEA. At a press conference, Erik reveals he's Pez Koi. After telling Yeimy about her affair, Gema gets an anonymous text.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Charly flips out once he learns Pez Koi's real identity, but his mother intervenes. Cata follows her suspicions. Yeimy and Zulma plot their next move.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Manín orders his thugs to do whatever it takes to get Charly to bring him cash. Vanesa gets in trouble with the law. Cata continues her investigations.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Manín's men make a discovery about Yeimy. Gema and Charly are forced to take a painful step regarding Vanesa. Cata confronts Juancho with her findings.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Vanesa grudgingly starts rehab. As Yeimy takes her relationship with Charly to the next level, Juancho worries about her. Manín's men go after Ligia.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Juancho and Yeimy argue over how far she'll go to get info from Charly. A photo makes Manín suspicious of Charly. Vanesa sees a familiar face at rehab.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: When Erik calls Manín on the phone Yeimy gave him, the DEA traces the call to the criminal's exact location and launches an operation to capture him.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: In rehab, new friend Pao shows Vanesa a healthier way to escape her problems. Cata is shocked by a revelation on her wedding day.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Gema harbors doubts about her separation. Cata has a few too many drinks and gives an emotional speech. Yeimy decides to continue living undercover.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy feeds Zulma her next news story. Charly and Juancho get heated while negotiating the terms of an upcoming concert. Erik visits Vanesa in rehab.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy, Gema and Charly decide to change the venue of the concert. Erik and Irma's connection grows stronger. Vanesa runs away from rehab.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy feels conflicted after Vanesa asks for a favor. Cata confides in her mom about Juancho. Charly gets involved again with Manín's business.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Cris Vega gets a nasty surprise. Erik and Charly rehearse before their big concert. Yeimy helps Gema find a PI to investigate her husband's activities.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy persuades Vanesa to speak to her dad. On the day of the concert, Irma helps Erik with his nerves, and Charly arrives at the venue to a surprise.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Vanesa brings Ruko to visit her dad backstage before the show. Axl catches Juancho letting teens in through a back door. Erik invites a guest onstage.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: When the concert's final performance is sabotaged, Erik scrambles to recover. Vanesa overhears her parents talking about Ruko. Gema's PI follows Charly.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Cata decides to keep closer tabs on Juancho. The PI's photos rattle Yeimy. Vanesa finds Ruko's drugs. Zulma posts her interview with Cris Vega.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy overhears Charly and Gema's amicable divorce negotiations and leaps into action. A suitor visits Vanesa. Erik asks Irma to be his girlfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Juancho asks Yeimy if she's still in love with Charly, and can no longer contain his own feelings. While out with friends, Vanesa runs into Ruko.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Irma signs with a label. The PI snaps photos of Charly conducting his shady side business. Cata's mom tells her how to fill the void in her marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Cata secretly takes her mom's latest advice. Erik shares a detail about his birth mom that stuns Juancho. Charly blackmails Gema to get what he wants.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Juancho helps Yeimy process his news. Charly investigates the car following him. Gema goes on a date, and later tries to gather evidence against Charly.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Juancho tries to dissuade Erik from asking Charly about Yeimy Montoya. Yeimy requests a DNA test. Gema gets the ammunition she needs to fight Charly.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Vanesa has a difficult talk with Pite. Lucio captures the PI. Cata catches Juancho lying again. Yeimy makes a change in her relationship with Charly.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Charly gets bad news from Don Edgar. Yeimy helps Vanesa with Ruko. When Gema shows Charly her evidence against him, he realizes he needs to stop her.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Charly asks Lucio for a favor. Yeimy baits Ruko with the help of the DEA. Cata pressures Juancho into signing more artists, including Cris Vega.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: After learning Gema will be working late at the studio, Charly calls Lucio. When Vanesa changes Gema's mind about Charly, Yeimy plays her last card.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy asks Zulma to record her testimony on video. Pite offers Vanesa advice based on his own experience. Juancho follows Charly to see who he meets.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Erik questions Charly's version of events. Gema's new boyfriend crashes a church service. Yeimy asks Juancho to pick up the DNA test results.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Axl looks through Excelsior's security footage. Zulma posts the video of Yeimy telling her side of the story. Cris Vega auditions for Juancho.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: As Juancho's marital doubts increase, Cata spends more time with Cris. The police get forensic test results back. Erik and Yeimy collaborate on a song.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: In light of the DNA evidence, Charly scrambles to cover his tracks. Pite tries to cheer up Vanesa. Juancho learns of Cata's efforts to get pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Erik follows Irma home and is shocked by what he discovers. Pite makes a confession to Vanesa. Over drinks, Cris gets Cata to confide in him.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: The police go after Yeimy, who has to decide whether to flee or turn herself in. Erik finds out how the police learned where Yeimy was hiding.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Juancho reveals Yeimy's true identity to the police. Cata shares surprising news with Juancho. Charly convinces the police to let him talk to Yeimy.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Axl shows Charly a new track he created. After hearing Juancho's news, Yeimy receives a surprise visitor. Charly coaches Irma to perform seductively.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Vanesa confronts Yeimy. The ballistic report comes back. Yeimy is warned she's going to be attacked that day. Zulma launches a campaign to free Yeimy.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Vanesa senses her father is hiding something from her and searches his bedroom. The police get a warrant to arrest Charly's shady accountant.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: After being visited by Jack and Juancho, Yeimy makes a big decision. Axl fumes over creative differences with Charly. Irma gets fed up with her dad.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy finally divulges her identity to Charly. Lucio gives his girlfriend an item for safekeeping. Vanesa introduces Pite to her father.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy tells Erik who his birth mom is and tries to answer all his questions. The police close in on Lucio. Ligia learns the truth about Erik's origins.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Erik reveals who his birth father is to Charly. Cata pays a surprise visit to Yeimy's home. The police call an anonymous number listed on Lucio's phone.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy agrees to work for Surround on one condition, and later reveals a new secret online. When Mora gets greedy, Charly's lawyer comes up with a plan.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Misfortune puts Cata in the wrong place at the wrong time. Axl suspects Charly is stealing his song. Lucio's girlfriend discovers what's on the phone.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Juancho makes a decision about Cata. Lucio's girlfriend pays Charly a visit. Irma discovers who her father injured. Yeimy arranges to meet with Axl.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: The police help Yeimy get a visit with Mora. Charly meets Lucio's girlfriend to pay her off. Irma tells her father what she learned about his victim.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Axl auditions for Yeimy. Ligia visits Irma's father. Erik and Cris's social media contest begins. Irma tries to dispel rumors about her and Charly.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Rosalía ardently pursues Juancho. Mora asks to speak to Detective Contreras and Yeimy. The man who unlocked the phone for Marlene goes to the police.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Rosalía tries to create distance between Juancho and Yeimy. Irma's father, José, visits Ligia. Yeimy seeks Axl's help in proving Charly's guilt.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy arranges to meet Marlene's friend who unlocked the phone. A fan asks Erik a delicate question. Juancho decides to wait no longer to pursue Yeimy.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: José attends his job interview. After Vanesa hears the recording, Yeimy is forced to tell her harsh truths. Juancho learns Rosalía tried to buy votes.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Vanesa's loved ones urge her to give the police what she found in the closet. Yeimy has a tough talk with Jack. Cata makes an announcement to Juancho.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Charly confronts Axl, who has a change of mind. During his concert, Erik invites his dad to join him onstage. The recording analysis results come back.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: When Vanesa gets a call from her father, she makes a confession to him. Charly plays his last hand. Two years later, everyone's fates are revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: After celebrating Erik's wildly successful world tour, Yeimy becomes convinced she is being followed and that an incarcerated Charly is to blame.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy, obsessively worried that Charly is going to be released early, asks Zulma for help. Charly mobilizes his fans to help declare he's a changed man.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A judge makes a decision about Charly's freedom while Yeimy's family asks her to stop fixating on him. Erik's meeting with Grey Shark creates conflict.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Cata's return to Colombia shocks Juancho and Yeimy, who worry about what will happen with Emilio. Manín reveals to Charly that he's still alive.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: When Erik is caught in a fire at Ligia's restaurant, Charly makes a daring rescue, but Yeimy is still suspicious. Sylvia confesses her true intentions.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: When Cata takes Emilio out for a play date, a frightening occurrence intensifies tensions between his parents. Charly asks Erik to forgive him.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Juancho asks Yeimy about her latest lyrics. Charly makes new plans with both Manín and Grey Shark. Vanesa is disappointed in her brother.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Cata takes Juancho to court to get shared custody of Emilio. José asks for Charly's blessing to propose to Ligia. Cris feels ignored by Surround.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Passions are inflamed and tempers explode at the Grey Shark launch party, where the headlining musical guest surprises everyone, especially Yeimy.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy makes a momentous decision about her music career, but Juancho questions her motives. Mike tells Charly to attack Surround more aggressively.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Surround prepares for Yeimy's headline-making career launch, but all the attention paid to the Reina irks Irma, and makes Charly's team feel threatened.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Irma shocks Erik with her career choice. Charly attempts to resist getting into a war with Yeimy, who is making plans for her new music video.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Erik begs both of his parents to stop feuding as their fighting escalates and results in an incarceration. Emilio identifies his kidnapper.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy faces a threat in prison, while back home, Emilio worries about her. Irma signs her new deal. Charly films his music video.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: The cops investigate the recent murder. Yeimy finally films her "Fijación" video. When José is attacked, Charly grows concerned that Manín is behind it.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Irma suspects José is drinking again. Yeimy and Charly face off in a music competition. Don Edgar escapes from prison. Vanesa asks her dad to be honest.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Juancho's jealousy intensifies when Yeimy and Charly perform a duet together. Mike capitalizes on the chemistry between the feuding musicians.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: A report claiming that Yeimy is caught in a love triangle between Charly and Juancho creates issues. Erik tells his mom he's going to a music camp.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Ligia makes plans for her wedding but José is detained. Sylvia comes clean to Charly. Emilio's asthma attack instigates a confrontation between parents.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Juancho and Yeimy try to salvage a contract for a commercial Erik was supposed to star in before he left for his retreat. Charly and Sylvia get closer.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: With Surround's future on the line, Yeimy and Juancho desperately search for Erik while debating whether they can ask for a favor from their nemesis.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Manín makes a move against Surround Vibes. Irma worries about what Erik is doing on the retreat. Juancho negotiates with Mike about the commercial.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: In the midst of filming a steamy commercial together, Yeimy and Charly get alarming news about Erik. Irma confronts Sandee.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Emotions run high as Erik's health remains grave. When their kiss goes public, Yeimy accuses Charly of trying to ruin her relationship with Juancho.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Juancho makes a decision about his relationship with Yeimy, who insists he is the love of her life. Manín becomes distrustful of Sylvia.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Erik insists Manín visited him at the hospital and Yeimy asks the police for to investigate whether that's true. Juancho and Cata argue about Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy worries about her loved ones after finding out that Manín is still alive. José asks Irma and Ligia for a second chance.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy heads to Miami to look into what the DEA is doing about Manín. Ligia worries about José when he goes missing. Cata takes Juancho to family court.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Manín has a violent confrontation with the police. Yeimy enacts a plan to contact Don Edgar. Irma visits the morgue in order to identify a body.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Charly airs the first episode of his documentary series. Erik suspects Manín is behind what happened to José. Yeimy secretly meets with Don Edgar.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Irma mourns her father at his funeral. Manín comes forward in a public video. Zulma discovers Yeimy's past betrayal.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy releases a public statement about Manín, which prompts a kidnapping. Vanesa begs her father to be honest about Gemma's death.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy tells Juancho they should officially separate for Emilio's sake. Erik attempts to lift a grieving Irma's spirits but his plan backfires.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Erik has a verbal confrontation with Manín. Charly makes a sincere, heartfelt apology to Juancho. Zulma speculates about the "Fijación" lyrics.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: As the concert promoting peace kicks off, personal dramas among the artists flare up. Charly confronts Yeimy about the inspiration behind "Fijación."
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Emilio struggles with Yeimy and Juancho's separation. Charly opens up to Yeimy about going after Manín. Zulma inflames the rumors about her ex-friend.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Manín's plan to take down Surround continues. Emilio frustrates Cata, who turns to Juancho for help. Yeimy is torn over whether to believe Charly.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Charly offers Yeimy proof he's telling the truth. Manín discovers someone leaked information to the police. Ligia decides to assist the authorities.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Manín seeks vengeance against Charly while concocting a plan for his nemesis. Yeimy unveils her new single. Irma and Drama Key's chemistry intensifies.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy is attacked while performing "Siete Vidas," leaving her loved ones in shock. At the hospital, tempers flare.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Titano attempts to finish what he started but Charly interrupts him. Irma rushes to Erik's side. Zulma and Juancho speak about forgiveness.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Juancho faces serious legal trouble just as Yeimy suffers a medical crisis. Erik argues with Charly about visiting the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Erik takes over at Surround while Juancho defends himself in prison. In her coma, Yeimy thinks of her grandmother. Manín and Don Edgar form an alliance.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Erik tries to keep the news about Juancho from Yeimy, who has just woken up from her coma. Botero questions Charly about his relationship with Titano.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: When Juancho's life is put in danger, an unexpected person helps him. Erik is shocked by what he hears from Drama Key. Cata faces financial issues.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Juancho's distrust of Charly inspires a new song. A distraught Irma lashes out at her loved ones. Yeimy discusses her confusing feelings with Olga.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Ligia visits Manín while Yeimy attempts to persuade Garrido to testify. During a Mero Power interview, a caller accuses Sandee of lying.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Sandee reveals her true identity to Erik, who struggles to forgive her. Botero expresses his feelings to Ligia. Pite and Vanesa argue about her father.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Charly confesses his love for Yeimy with a passionate gesture. Irma and Drama Key's performance infuriates Erik. Juancho records his single.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: The intimate video Sylvia filmed wreaks havoc on Charly's personal life. Meanwhile, Yeimy finally returns home to greet her loved ones.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Axl worries about Irma's drinking. While Charly films his music video in prison, an unexpected incident happens that makes Juancho suspicious.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: After the jailhouse murder, accusations run rampant and Juancho becomes frustrated with what he perceives as Yeimy doubting him.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Axl advises Erik to speak with Irma about her drinking. Juancho is given permission to serve time under house arrest but tensions continue with Yeimy.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: After arguing with Juancho and Erik, Yeimy shares an unexpected and passionate encounter with Charly. Manín loses his trust in Sylvia.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Sylvia's DEA colleague searches for her. A fight between Charly and Erik makes Vanesa reconsider her move with Pite. Yeimy stands up to Juancho.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: When Juancho questions whether Yeimy ever truly loved him, she's hurt by his actions. Sylvia turns to Charly for support. Manín makes plans for Pegaso.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Erik worries Yeimy is overexerting herself as she prepares to perform at the launch of Pegaso. Cris becomes suspicious of Cata and Mike.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: After Yeimy suffers a devastating health setback, Mike takes advantage to launch Irma as the new queen. Pite's friends say goodbye before his move.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Erik learns the truth about Charly and Manín. Botero makes a romantic gesture to provoke Manín. Juancho comes up with an idea to help Surround.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Juancho attends his court hearing, where he hopes to regain his freedom. Afterward, he and Yeimy argue about her future at Surround.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: When a hurt Juancho takes steps that emotionally destroy Yeimy, Charly offers support. Ligia asks Manín for a divorce. Caronte and Titano follow Sylvia.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Erik and Juancho get in a heated argument at Surround. Mike makes an unexpected offer. Yeimy leans on Charly while escaping from pressures back home.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy makes a decision about starting a public, romantic relationship with Charly. Vanesa's dad surprises her. Sandee and Irma compete for a movie deal.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy struggles with how to react to the video Manín sent her. Vanesa bids farewell to everyone. Titano tells his boss about the Clarkson kidnapping.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Mike announces the news that Yeimy is joining Grey Shark and not all of her colleagues are happy. Manín holds two DEA agents hostage.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Sylvia attempts a daring escape while Charly tries to help her. Mike accuses Surround and Sandee of plagiarizing the theme song for an upcoming film.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Charly approaches the DEA about officially signing a deal with them. Afterward, at Grey Shark, he and Yeimy work on their duet "Destino" together.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Charly is on edge about helping the DEA capture Manín and Yeimy suspects he's hiding something from her. Drama Key and Cris struggle to collaborate.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Ligia's loved ones scramble to find out where Manín has taken her, while Erik throws himself into his music to distract himself from worrying about her.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Charly continues to work on the plan to ensnare Titano and save his mom. Yeimy is disgusted by Mike's version of her duet. Juancho confronts Cata.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Irma offers Erik help producing his duet with Sandee. Charly sends Manín a coded message in hopes of regaining his trust.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Charly and Yeimy present their version of "Destino." Manín asks his nephew to prove his loyalty with a fatal task. Drama Key makes an accusation.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Drama Key's revelation causes a stir at Pegaso. Charly goes forward with his plan for Juancho, while Yeimy worries about her ex.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Charly and Manín face off in a violent confrontation as the singer tries to save his mother. Yeimy is overwhelmed by concern for Juancho.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Juancho's idea to double down on Charly's lie leaves Yeimy, Buho and his fans completely devastated. Botero and the DEA continue to look for Manín.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Cris tries to support a mourning Cata. Mike and Yeimy argue about her career. When Caronte betrays Manín, Botero makes another attempt to capture him.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy organizes a musical memorial for Juancho but her grief becomes too much to bear. As she's planning, her ex and Charly have a heart-to-heart.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Erik feels torn between Irma and Sandee. When Charly and Ligia visit Yeimy at her house, a dangerous — and ultimately fatal — incident occurs.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Charly, Juancho and Yeimy discuss moving forward with their lives. Mike seeks revenge, while Titano devises a plot of his own against the Queen of Flow.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Juancho, Yeimy and Emilio spend time together as a family. The fallout from Mike's video continues. Titano asks Charly to visit him.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy considers restarting her relationship with Juancho, but a conversation with his sister seeds doubts. Sandee makes a big career decision.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Charly struggles to handle Titano's accusations while Yeimy figures out the criminal's goal. Juancho has an honest conversation with Daniela.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Titano's escape frightens Yeimy. Charly insists on protecting her, leading to conflict with Juancho. Mike tells Irma and Sandee to sing together.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy proposes a business idea to Juancho and Charly, while also legally challenging Mike. Irma and Sandee disagree about music. Titano targets Erik.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: With Erik and Irma in grave danger, Yeimy and Charly argue about how to deal with Titano's threats. Meanwhile, Cata attempts to undermine Mike.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Yeimy turns to Juancho for support while Charly attempts to stop the singer from turning herself in to Titano in exchange for Erik's freedom.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: When Charly pressures Yeimy to decide about their relationship, she insists on focusing on her career. Juancho and Cata continue investigating Mike.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: The musicians from Surround and Grey Shark team up to take down Mike after his deceptive business tactics come to light.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Just as Yeimy is about to reveal how she wants to move forward with her life, the empowered singer is once again put in peril.
episodes.title: Episode 89
